General.Name: Aurora Acquisition Corp
General.Description: Aurora Acquisition Corp. does not have significant operations. The company intends to effect a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses. Aurora Acquisition Corp. was incorporated in 2020 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
